contextItems.name: devcontainer.json
contextItems.content:
```/workspace/.devcontainer/devcontainer.json
{
    "name": "Python 3",
    "image": "mcr.microsoft.com/devcontainers/python:1-3.12",
    "remoteUser": "vscode",
    "updateRemoteUserUID": true,
    "containerUser": "vscode",
    "workspaceMount": "source=${localWorkspaceFolder},target=/workspace,type=bind,consistency=cached",
    "workspaceFolder": "/workspace",
    "remoteEnv": {
        "GIT_SSH_COMMAND": "ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null",
        "SYNC_LOCALHOST_KUBECONFIG": "true",
        "LOCAL_WORKSPACE_FOLDER": "${localWorkspaceFolder}",
        "VIRTUAL_ENV_PROMPT": "(dev) ",
        "SHELL": "/bin/bash",
        "GPG_TTY": "/dev/pts/0",
        "GNUPGHOME": "/home/vscode/.gnupg",
        "SSH_AUTH_SOCK": "/run/host-services/ssh-auth.sock",
        "GPG_KEY": "oleg1203@gmail.com"
    },
    "mounts": [
        "source=${localEnv:HOME}/.ssh,target=/home/vscode/.ssh,type=bind,consistency=cached",
        "source=${localEnv:HOME}/.gnupg,target=/home/vscode/.gnupg,type=bind,consistency=cached",
        "source=${localWorkspaceFolder}/.continue,target=/home/vscode/.continue,type=bind,consistency=cached"
    ],
    "initializeCommand": "mkdir -p ${localWorkspaceFolder}/.continue",
    "postCreateCommand": [
        "sh",
        "-c",
        "export PATH=/custom/python/installation/bin:$PATH && \
        which python3 && python3 --version && \
        which pip3 && pip3 --version && \
        sudo chown -R vscode:vscode /home/vscode && \
        sudo chmod 700 /home/vscode/.ssh /home/vscode/.gnupg /home/vscode/.continue && \
        sudo chown -R vscode:vscode /workspace && \
        sudo chmod 755 /workspace && \
        /bin/bash /workspace/.devcontainer/init-scripts/init.sh"
    ],
    "onCreateCommand": "sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y gnupg2 pinentry-tty gpg-agent",
    "postStartCommand": [
        "/bin/bash",
        "-c",
        "until curl -s http://172.17.0.1:11434/api/health >/dev/null; do echo 'Waiting for Ollama...'; sleep 2; done && echo 'Ollama is ready!'"
    ],
    "postSaveCommand": [
        "/bin/bash",
        "-c",
        "if [ \"$CODE_FILE\" != \"\" ]; then black $CODE_FILE; fi"
    ],
    "features": {
        "ghcr.io/devcontainers/features/git:1": {
            "version": "latest",
            "ppa": true
        },
        "ghcr.io/devcontainers/features/github-cli:1": {},
        "ghcr.io/devcontainers/features/common-utils:2": {
            "installZsh": true,
            "upgradePackages": true,
            "username": "vscode",
            "userUid": "1000",
            "userGid": "1000"
        },
        "ghcr.io/devcontainers/features/python:1": "none"
    },
    "settingsSync": {
        "configuration": true,
        "fileAssociations": false,
        "ignore": [
            "*.pyc",
            "**/node_modules/**"
        ],
        "proxy": false
    },
    "customizations": {
        "vscode": {
            "settings": {
                "python.defaultInterpreterPath": "/usr/local/bin/python",
                "python.formatting.provider": "black",
                "python.formatting.blackArgs": [
                    "--line-length",
                    "88"
                ],
                "python.linting.enabled": true,
                "python.linting.pylintEnabled": true,
                "python.linting.flake8Enabled": true,
                "python.linting.flake8Args": [
                    "--max-line-length=88",
                    "--ignore=E203,W503"
                ],
                "python.sortImports.args": [
                    "--profile",
                    "black"
                ],
                "python.sortImports.path": "${workspaceFolder}/.venv/bin/isort",
                "python.sortImports.organizeImports": true,
                "python.analysis.languageServerMode": "default",
                "python.analysis.indexing": true,
                "python.analysis.autoImportCompletions": true,
                "python.analysis.autoSearchPaths": true,
                "python.analysis.completeFunctionParens": true,
                "python.analysis.typeCheckingMode": "basic",
                "python.testing.pytestEnabled": true,
                "python.testing.unittestEnabled": false,
                "python.testing.autoTestDiscoverOnSaveEnabled": true,
                "python.testing.autoTestLaunchType": "background",
                "python.testing.autoTestLaunchArgs": [
                    "--disable-warnings",
                    "--show-capture=stdout"
                ],
                "python.testing.autoTestLaunchPythonArgs": [
                    "-m",
                    "pytest"
                ],
                "python.testing.pytestArgs": [
                    "--cov=.",
                    "--cov-report=xml",
                    "-v"
                ],
                "coverage-gutters.showGutterCoverage": true,
                "coverage-gutters.showLineCoverage": true,
                "coverage-gutters.showRulerCoverage": true,
                "editor.suggestSelection": "recentlyUsed",
                "editor.tabCompletion": "on",
                "editor.acceptSuggestionOnCommitCharacter": true,
                "editor.acceptSuggestionOnEnter": "smart",
                "editor.quickSuggestions": {
                    "other": "on",
                    "comments": "on",
                    "strings": "on"
                },
                "editor.inlineSuggest.enabled": true,
                "editor.suggest.preview": true,
                "editor.suggest.showStatusBar": true,
                "editor.formatOnSave": true,
                "extensions.autoUpdate": true,
                "extensions.autoCheckUpdates": true,
                "git.autofetch": true,
                "git.confirmSync": false,
                "git.enableCommitSigning": true,
                "git.postCommitCommand": "push",
                "git.enableSmartCommit": true,
                "git.autoStash": true,
                "git.autoSync": true,
                "git.name": "Oleg Kizyma",
                "git.email": "oleg1203@gmail.com",
                "update.mode": "default",
                "update.channel": "insiders",
                "remote.extensionKind": {
                    "*": [
                        "workspace"
                    ]
                },
                "dev.containers.defaultExtensions": [],
                "dev.containers.copyGitConfig": false,
                "dev.containers.gitCredentialsHelper": "cache",
                "dev.containers.workspaceMountConsistency": "cached",
                "github.copilot.includeFilePatterns": [],
                "continue.includeFilePatterns": [],
                "terminal.integrated.tabs.title": "${process}${separator}${sequence}",
                "terminal.integrated.tabs.description": "${task}${separator}${local}${separator}${cwd}",
                "terminal.integrated.tabs.separator": " - ",
                "terminal.integrated.defaultProfile.linux": "bash",
                "terminal.integrated.shellIntegration.decorationsEnabled": true,
                "terminal.integrated.shellIntegration.enabled": true,
                "terminal.integrated.fontSize": 12,
                "terminal.integrated.fontFamily": "Menlo, Monaco, 'Courier New', monospace",
                "workbench.editor.showTabs": true,
                "workbench.statusBar.visible": true,
                "workbench.colorCustomizations": {
                    "--vscode-editor-foreground": "var(--vscode-editor-foreground)",
                    "--vscode-status-bar-background": "var(--vscode-status-bar-background)"
                },
                "files.associations": {
                    "*.py": "python",
                    "*.yaml": "yaml",
                    "*.yml": "yaml"
                }
            },
            "extensions": [
                "ms-python.python",
                "ms-python.vscode-pylance",
                "ms-python.black-formatter",
                "ms-python.isort",
                "ms-python.autopep8",
                "ms-python.flake8",
                "ms-azuretools.vscode-docker",
                "batisteo.vscode-django",
                "dbaeumer.vscode-eslint",
                "github.copilot",
                "github.copilot-chat",
                "eamodio.gitlens",
                "ms-vscode-remote.remote-ssh",
                "ms-vscode-remote.remote-ssh-edit",
                "ms-vscode-remote.remote-explorer",
                "github.vscode-pull-request-github",
                "redhat.vscode-yaml",
                "GitHub.vscode-github-actions",
                "continue.continue",
                "saoudrizwan.claude-dev",
                "ryanluker.vscode-coverage-gutters",
                "GitHub.copilot-chat",
                "GitHub.copilot"
            ]
        }
    },
    "portsAttributes": {
        "9000": {
            "label": "Hello Remote World",
            "onAutoForward": "notify"
        }
    }
}
```

message.content:
It looks like there are several issues with your `devcontainer.json` file and the `init.sh` script.

Here are some observations and suggestions:

1. The `init.sh` script has several syntax errors, such as `No: command not found`, `Aa: command not found`, and others. These errors suggest that the script is not properly formatted or contains invalid commands.
2. The script is trying to execute commands like `log` without specifying the full path or command. You should specify the full path to the `log` command or ensure that it is in the system's PATH.
3. The script is trying to execute commands like `Qwen` and `⌘⏎`, which are not valid commands. Remove these lines or replace them with valid commands.
4. The script is trying to execute a PGP-signed message, which is not a valid command. Remove this section or replace it with a valid command.
5. The script is trying to install packages using `apt-get`, but the package manager is not configured correctly. Ensure that you have the correct package manager configuration and that the package manager is installed.
6. The script is trying to set up a chroot environment, but it's not clear why this is necessary. Remove this section or ensure that it's properly configured.

To fix these issues, I recommend the following:

1. Review the `init.sh` script and remove any invalid or unnecessary commands.
2. Ensure that all commands in the script are properly formatted and have the correct syntax.
3. Specify the full path to any commands that are not in the system's PATH.
4. Remove any sections of the script that are not necessary or are causing errors.
5. Test the script in a shell environment to ensure that it runs correctly before running it in the dev container.

Additionally, I recommend reviewing the `devcontainer.json` file to ensure that it's properly configured and that all settings are correct.

```/workspace/.devcontainer/devcontainer.json
                    "--vscode-status-bar-background": "var(--vscode-status-bar-background)"
                },
                "files.associations": {
                    "*.py": "python",
                    "*.yaml": "yaml",
                    "*.yml": "yaml"
                }
            },
            "extensions": [
                "ms-python.python",
                "ms-python.vscode-pylance",
                "ms-python.black-formatter",
                "ms-python.isort",
                "ms-python.autopep8",
                "ms-python.flake8",
                "ms-azuretools.vscode-docker",
                "batisteo.vscode-django",
                "dbaeumer.vscode-eslint",
                "github.copilot",
                "github.copilot-chat",
                "eamodio.gitlens",
                "ms-vscode-remote.remote-ssh",
                "ms-vscode-remote.remote-ssh-edit",
                "ms-vscode-remote.remote-explorer",
                "github.vscode-pull-request-github",
                "redhat.vscode-yaml",
                "GitHub.vscode-github-actions",
                "continue.continue",
                "saoudrizwan.claude-dev",
                "ryanluker.vscode-coverage-gutters",
                "GitHub.copilot-chat",
                "GitHub.copilot"
            ]
        }
    },
    "portsAttributes": {
        "9000": {
            "label": "Hello Remote World",
            "onAutoForward": "notify"
        }
    }
}
```
